title: RIOT HELP
body: MY ACCOUNT GOT HACKED AND IT GOT BANNED I CHANGED MY PASSWORD BUT NOW I CAN'T PLAY PLEASE HELP

replies.body: Don't worry, we can help!  Run through our [account recovery](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751694-Recovering-Your-Account) guide to recover your account and change your password.  If you now longer have access to your email, hit us up through an [account recovery form](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416).  We'll reply back as soon as we can!
that's not the problem my account got banned because the hacker played i already chaged the password
We can look into this and review any bans through the form.  Fill it out so we have some more context and we'll work with you individually on this.
